ImageData.Description: Description of the anatomical data used for co-registration. Includes Levels: DICOM, NIFTI, MR-less.

Levels.DICOM: MRI scan in medical image data format
Levels.NIFTI: MRI scan in Neuroimaging Informatics Technology Initiative file format
Levels.MR-less: MNI model based on a transformed standard dataset (MNI ICBM152 non-linear symmetric T1 Average Brain)

IntendedFor: Path to the anatomical file this coordinate system refers to. BIDS-style path. (example: bids::sub-01/ses-01/anat/sub-01_T1w.nii.gz)
AnatomicalLandmarkCoordinateSystem: Defines the coordinate system for the anatomical landmarks. See the Coordinate Systems Appendix for a list of restricted keywords for coordinate systems. If
, provide definition of the coordinate system in
AnatomicalLandmarkCoordinateSystemUnits: Units of the coordinates of Anatomical Landmark Coordinate System. Must be one of:
AnatomicalLandmarkCoordinateSystemDescri: Free-form text description of the coordinate system. May also include a link to a documentation page or paper describing the system in greater detail.
AnatomicalLandmarkCoordinates: Key-value pairs of the labels and 3-D digitized locations of anatomical landmarks, interpreted following the
: [20.2,11.3,9.1]}. Each array MUST contain three numeric values corresponding to x, y, and z axis of the coordinate system in that exact order.
AnatomicalLandmarkCoordinatesDescription: [x, y, z] coordinates of anatomical landmarks. NAS - nasion, LPA - left preauricular point, RPA - right preauricular point
DigitizedHeadPoints: Relative path to the file containing the locations of digitized head points collected during the session. (for example,
DigitizedHeadPointsNumber: Number of digitized head points during co-regestration.
RmsDeviationDescription: Description of how RMS deviation is calculated and for which markers.
